definition: full of or showing high spirits, a white sparkling wine either produced in Champagne or resembling that produced there
details:
adjective
- full of or showing high spirits
= example: full of or showing high spirits
- emitting or filled with bubbles as from carbonation or fermentation
= synonyms: bubbling, frothy, foaming, foamy, effervescing, spumy
noun
- a white sparkling wine either produced in Champagne or resembling that produced there
= synonyms: champagne
